commands.name: health
commands.description: Run comprehensive project health check (10-point inspection)

commands.name: fix
commands.description: Run health check with auto-fixes enabled

commands.name: project
commands.description: Interactive project orchestrator with architectural alignment

commands.name: worktree
commands.description: Create git worktree for current session

commands.name: chittyid
commands.command: curl -s https://id.chitty.cc/health | jq '.' || echo 'ChittyID service unreachable'

commands.name: quick-fix
commands.command:
bash -c '[[ ! -f .gitignore ]] && echo "node_modules/
.env
.wrangler/
dist/
*.log
.DS_Store" > .gitignore && echo "Created .gitignore"; [[ ! -f CLAUDE.md ]] && echo "# CLAUDE.md

Project: $(basename $(pwd))
ChittyOS Integrated
" > CLAUDE.md && echo "Created CLAUDE.md"; [[ ! -f .env.example ]] && echo "CHITTY_ID_TOKEN=your_token_here" > .env.example && echo "Created .env.example"'

commands.name: deps
commands.description: Install dependencies and check for vulnerabilities
